item.title: The ICE Hoaxes Just Keep Getting More Absurd, and Dangerous
Federal judge says ICE detainees 'shouldn't be sleeping next to overflowing toilets' at Chicago-area facility
item.description: Federal Judge Robert Gettleman ordered an ICE facility near Chicago to improve living conditions for detainees, requiring clean bedding and hygiene.

item.title: Pro-Israel House Dem draws leftist primary challenge
item.description: Michael Blake, a former New York state lawmaker, has launched a bid to challenge incumbent Democratic Rep. Ritchie Torres in the U.S. House.

item.title: Nancy Pelosi Confirms Retirement: Woman Who Made Millions in Congress Is Finally Leaving It
Exclusive: Coast Guard Sets Record for Sea Drug Seizures
item.description: The U.S. Coast Guard set a record for the annual amount of drugs seized at sea, Newsmax has learned.
